verses.verse: And Abram <WH87> went <WH5927> up out of Egypt, <WH4714> he, and his wife, <WH802> and all <WH3605> that he had, and Lot <WH3876> with him, into the south. <WH5045>
And Abram <WH87> was very <WH3966> rich <WH3513> in cattle, <WH4735> in silver, <WH3701> and in gold. <WH2091>

And he went <WH3212> on his journeys <WH4550> from the south <WH5045> even to Bethel, <WH1008> to the place <WH4725> where <WH834> his tent <WH168> had been <WH1961> at the beginning, <WH8462> between <WH996> Bethel <WH1008> and Hai; <WH5857>

To the place <WH4725> of the altar, <WH4196> which <WH834> he had made <WH6213> there <WH8033> at the first: <WH7223> and there <WH8033> Abram <WH87> called <WH7121> on the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>
And Lot <WH3876> also, <WH1571> which went <WH1980> with Abram, <WH87> had <WH1961> flocks, <WH6629> and herds, <WH1241> and tents. <WH168>

And the land <WH776> was not able <WH5375> to bear <WH5375> them, that they might dwell <WH3427> together: <WH3162> for their substance <WH7399> was great, <WH7227> so that they could <WH3201> not dwell <WH3427> together. <WH3162>

And there was a strife <WH7379> between <WH996> the herdsmen <WH7462> of Abram's <WH87> cattle <WH4735> and the herdsmen <WH7462> of Lot's <WH3876> cattle: <WH4735> and the Canaanite <WH3669> and the Perizzite <WH6522> dwelled <WH3427> then <WH227> in the land. <WH776>

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> to Lot, <WH3876> Let there be no <WH408> strife, <WH4808> I pray <WH4994> you, between <WH996> me and you, and between <WH996> my herdsmen <WH7462> and your herdsmen; <WH7462> for we be brothers. <WH251>

Is not the whole <WH3605> land <WH776> before <WH6440> you? separate <WH6504> yourself, I pray <WH4994> you, from me: if <WH518> you will take the left <WH8040> hand, <WH8041> then I will go to the right; <WH3231> or if <WH518> you depart to the right <WH3225> hand, <WH3225> then I will go to the left. <WH8041>

And Lot <WH3876> lifted <WH5375> up his eyes, <WH5869> and beheld <WH7200> all <WH3605> the plain <WH3603> of Jordan, <WH3383> that it was well watered <WH4945> every <WH3605> where, before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> destroyed <WH7843> Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah, <WH6017> even as the garden <WH1588> of the LORD, <WH3068> like the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> as you come <WH935> to Zoar. <WH6820>

Then Lot <WH3876> chose <WH977> him all <WH3605> the plain <WH3603> of Jordan; <WH3383> and Lot <WH3876> journeyed <WH5265> east: <WH6924> and they separated <WH6504> themselves the one <WH376> from the other. <WH251>

Abram <WH87> dwelled <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and Lot <WH3876> dwelled <WH3427> in the cities <WH5892> of the plain, <WH3603> and pitched <WH167> his tent <WH167> toward <WH5704> Sodom. <WH5467>
But the men <WH582> of Sodom <WH5467> were wicked <WH7451> and sinners <WH2400> before the LORD <WH3068> exceedingly. <WH3966>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Abram, <WH87> after <WH310> that Lot <WH3876> was separated <WH6504> from him, Lift <WH5375> up now your eyes, <WH5869> and look <WH7200> from the place <WH4725> where <WH834> <WH8033> you are northward, <WH6828> and southward, <WH5045> and eastward, <WH6924> and westward: <WH3220>
For all <WH3605> the land <WH776> which <WH834> you see, <WH7200> to you will I give <WH5414> it, and to your seed <WH2233> for ever. <WH5769>

And I will make <WH7760> your seed <WH2233> as the dust <WH6083> of the earth: <WH776> so <WH834> that if <WH518> a man <WH376> can <WH3201> number <WH4487> the dust <WH6083> of the earth, <WH776> then shall your seed <WH2233> also <WH1571> be numbered. <WH4487>
Arise, <WH6965> walk <WH1980> through the land <WH776> in the length <WH753> of it and in the breadth <WH7341> of it; for I will give <WH5414> it to you.

Then Abram <WH87> removed <WH167> his tent, <WH167> and came <WH935> and dwelled <WH3427> in the plain <WH436> of Mamre, <WH4471> which is in Hebron, <WH2275> and built <WH1129> there <WH8033> an altar <WH4196> to the LORD. <WH3068>
